   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to CVRP (Capacitated Vehicle Routing Problem)'s documentation!
======================================================================

About this project
------------------

This project has been realized for the AI50 project. The aim of the project was
to modelize the CVRP problem and find solution with meta heuristics algorithms, 
multi-agents systems and machine learning.

   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Contents:

   installation
   introduction
   tutorial/tutorial
   packages/packages
